attributes.action: MPs  that wrongly representing their constituents be held accountable
attributes.additional_details: Over 400 constituency  voted  to leave the EU  yet lots of their MPs voted against this
attributes.background: Should a MP that blatantly goes against the wishes of the majority of their constancy  be held accountable and sacked

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for people to lose their jobs.

There's a petition about allowing constituents to recall and remove MPs. You might like to sign this petition. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/270324
